description: Returns a paginated list of individual assessments based on filter settings. These filter settings can specify a combination of premigration assessment runs, migration tasks, and assessment status values.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters applied to the individual assessments described in the form of key-value pairs. Valid filter names: replication-task-assessment-run-arn, replication-task-arn, status (dict) --- Identifies the name and value of a filter object. This filter is used to limit the number and type of DMS objects that are returned for a particular Describe* call or similar operation. Filters are used as an optional parameter for certain API operations. The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation. The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: A pagination token returned for you to pass to a subsequent request. If you pass this token as the Marker value in a subsequent request, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified in the request by MaxRecords.

nested_items.name: ReplicationTaskIndividualAssessments
nested_items.description: One or more individual assessments as specified by Filters.

nested_items.name: ReplicationTaskIndividualAssessmentArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of this individual assessment.

nested_items.name: ReplicationTaskAssessmentRunArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the premigration assessment run that is created to run this individual assessment.

nested_items.name: ReplicationTaskIndividualAssessmentStartDate
nested_items.description: Date when this individual assessment was started as part of running the StartReplicationTaskAssessmentRun operation.
